title: Support items need work like Jungler items
body:
You hardly ever seen a Jungler not build a Jungle item. Why? Because they need it for clearing the jungle and to get the most out of Smite.

However, you do see support players skip over a support items all the time.  ALL the time.

I say fuck that.  Create a summoner spell that is for supports. Taking it lets you access support items. Make the spell really useful for supports so that they WANT to take it, the way Junglers take smite, and also make the benefits of the different support items for that smite be appealing to different types of champions the way the Jungler items are. 

Skipping vision is also not cool. I am for all final builds of all support item paths to include vision.  I am not for freedom of choice in this area. Take the support summoners spell, get a support item, get vision. Its what you do. Just like you take smite when you jungle and get a jungle item.

I am tired of bot lane antics. People need to be reigned in regarding the support role.
